page.title: 10W.CHILTINGTON LIFE STYLES
page.content: There are{5 shops in W.Chilt;}a Post Office and General Store by the Church and at the Common,and 2 food shops and a Butcher at the Common. In our survey people said they bought Stamps,Sweets, Newspapers and Petrol frequently in the village. The children also bought Comics, Books, Toys & Rubbers locally. Most adults went to{Storrington}for all their Groceries,Wine,Banks,Estate Agents and Building Societies.Clothes, Shoes and Large Toys were usually bought in{Worthing}or in{Horsham. Most people go on long journeys to go to the Cinema,Theatre or a Concert,eg. {Worthing,Brighton,Horsham or London. Some went to{New York or Malta}but may be they were on holiday or business! For an evening drink most people go to one of the{3 village Pubs;}The Queen's Head, Elephant & Castle & The 5 Bells.Few seem to go out for a meal.
